snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Apocalypse
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played By: Eino

Not my best longplay, but I only used saves between levels and didn't lose lives.

Mission 1: 2:27
Mission 2: 7:25
Mission 3: 14:48
Mission 4: 20:04
Mission 5: 26:32

In mission 4 there are three choppers which will rush from bottom left when reaching the left end of the map. You can only see one because I got the other two with seekers missiles before those appeared on screen. Mission 4 was recorded from first completion of that level so I wasn't sure what to do in the end.

Didn't rescue every hostage, because it would had taken a long time to do so. Game pauses while selecting weapons. After completion the game resumes in mission 5. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
